channel.title: Dr. Kleiner model issue
channel.description:
wait, how did you access model viewer?
it gives me the "Unable to fine gameinfo.txt. Solutions:" error, its so annoying

item.title: Dr. Kleiner model issue
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
Extracted the files from Black Mesa’s VPKs and dropped the files into HL2 and used its model viewer. I remember even having to get the HL2 model viewer working, but that was quite a while back, can’t say I remember what sort of voodoo that was.

Read full topic
